alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Northern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CLEARFIELD... NORTHERN HUNTINGDON...CENTRE...NORTHERN BLAIR AND NORTHERN CAMBRIA COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 957 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bellefonte to near Tyrone to 16 miles north of Ebensburg. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altoona, State College, Huntingdon, Bellefonte, Tyrone, Ebensburg, Nanty-Glo, Park Forest Village, Woodward, Northern Cambria, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Lamar, Stormstown, Lemont, Bald Eagle, Zion, Lakemont, Bellwood and Houserville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
